sentences.english: Results showed that gatifloxacin was a potent and broad spectrum antibacterial agent.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，加替沙星具有強而廣譜的體外抗菌活性。

sentences.english: Creating a new broad-spectrum resistant variety has become the goal of potato breeders.
sentences.chinese: 因此，培育廣譜抗病新品種是育種學家的首選目標。

sentences.english: Induced resistance had wide ranging and no specific.
sentences.chinese: 誘發抗性具有非特異性和廣譜性。

sentences.english: Rifampicin Capsules is high efficacy broad-spectrum antibiotic.
sentences.chinese: 利福平膠囊是一種高效“超廣譜”的抗生素藥物。

sentences.english: The mechanism of salt tolerance and universal stress resistance in Lepidium latifolium.
sentences.chinese: 大葉獨行菜耐鹽及廣譜抗逆性的基礎機理研究。

sentences.english: Amoxi-Tabs is a semisynthetic antibiotic with a broad spectrum of activity.
sentences.chinese: 標籤是一種半合成抗生素具有廣譜的活動。

sentences.english: At present, broad-spectrum cross-AIDS vaccine technology or a new hot spot.
sentences.chinese: 當前，艾滋病疫苗廣譜交叉技術或成爲新熱點。

sentences.english: A new broad spectrum fungicide cyprodinil was briefly reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 簡介了新型廣譜殺菌劑嘧菌環胺。

sentences.english: Currently there are only two proven broad-spectrum antibiotics for its non-effective.
sentences.chinese: 目前證明只有兩種非廣譜的抗生素對其有效。

sentences.english: As a result, the broad-spectrum antibiosis and no drug resistance of TCM has the extraordinary advantage.
sentences.chinese: 中藥的廣譜抗菌性及無耐藥性的優勢明顯。

sentences.english: Produce broad-spectrum antibiosis and medicine served as raw material, etc.
sentences.chinese: 生產廣譜抗菌類藥品及原料藥等。

sentences.english: VIP3 shows activity against many lepidopteran insect larvae.
sentences.chinese: 而VIP3對鱗翅目昆蟲具有較廣譜的殺蟲活性。

sentences.english: Cecropin from Chinese oak silkmoth Antheraea pernyi has a broad spectrum bactericidal effect.
sentences.chinese: 柞蠶抗菌肽具有廣譜殺菌功能。

sentences.english: Broad-spectrum drugs or vaccines can’t do very much against a target that morphs so quickly.
sentences.chinese: 廣譜藥物或疫苗對變化如此迅速的目標作用有限。

sentences.english: We could conclude that MMLS broad antimicrobial spectrum and good inhibiting effects on PRV.
sentences.chinese: MMLS具有廣譜的抑菌作用和抗僞狂犬病毒作用。

sentences.english: RESULTS Three quinolones had broad antibacterial spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 結果喹諾酮藥物有廣譜的抗菌作用。
